data.text: @deptoflabour the matter is resolved but now Its been 3 weeks no respond no feedback I'm loosing contracts because of that can you please attend the matter urgently cause i cant go to the site because of COIDA

@deptoflabour I have attempt to register new company for COIDA it gave me validation error then I forwarded screen shot of the error message,CK,Tax and ID to ROEonlinesupport@labour.gov.za and cfcallcetre email I made follow up through calling CF call cetre this used to take only a day then
@deptoflabour We should be able to access SIYAYA so we can be sure that the company payroll submissions are correct
